### Important Functions
myconvert = function(xl) {
  if(stringr::str_ends(xl, "XLS") | stringr::str_ends(xl, "xls")){
  v=try(readxl::read_xls(paste0(dird, xl)), silent = TRUE)
  }
  else{
    v = NA
  }
  v
}
getmode <- function(v) {
   uniqv <- unique(v)
   uniqv[which.max(tabulate(match(v, uniqv)))]
}
